DOC.detailed_description: The study enroll 200 patient 6 site . Patients enrol upon meet entrance criterion , include obtain write informed consent . Eligible patient must clinically indicated coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) use autologous saphenous vein graft ( SVG ) . The study prospective , randomize , repeat measure control trial base patient receive one control SVG one external Saphenous Vein Support ( eSVS ) Mesh treat SVG . Each patient control .
DOC.criteria: Patient diagnose multivessel coronary artery disease Requires Saphenous Vein Graft ( SVG ) Coronary Artery Bypass Graft ( CABG ) surgery Right Coronary Artery ( RCA ) Circumflex Artery ( Cx ) system due atherosclerotic coronary artery disease SVGs ( eSVS Mesh AND Control ) meet size requirement outline eSVS Mesh Instructions Use eSVS Mesh implant procedure perform outlined eSVS Mesh Instructions Use Are able give inform consent Not able give inform consent No appropriate target coronary vessel SVGs ( eSVS Mesh Control ) meet size requirement outline eSVS Mesh Instructions Use eSVS Mesh implant procedure perform outlined eSVS Mesh Instructions Use Inability tolerate comply normal postsurgical drug regimen Inability comply require followup coronary angiography/CT
